attributes.action: Keep Schools closed until September to be sure of no second wave of Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: Evidence shows that Coronavirus is spread easily in large groups and children spread it easily too! This would be probable that a second wave could happen. Many people are apprehensive about pupils returning to school and before summer just seems a little bit premature. If schools remain closed until September there will be a higher chance that no second wave of the virus can occur,putting our country and more risk.Keeping schools closed would ensure that the country can rebuild after the virus.
attributes.background: Schools should remain closed until September to protect staff,students and parents from exposure to the Coronavirus. Pupils can spread the virus easily and large groups of people in one place is the perfect breeding ground and could cause a second wave of the virus putting us all at risk to it.
